00021 /* the main program */
00022 void mexFunction(int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[], int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[])
00023 {
00024   MexParams Params(0,1,nlhs,plhs,2,2,nrhs,prhs);
00025   const Image img(Params.getInput(0));
00026   const Image filt(Params.getInput(1));
00027   Image result = conv2PreserveEnergy(img,filt);
00028   Params.setOutput(0,result.getArray());
